select *,e.database_name special_database_name,ee.database_name database_name from t_sod_data_class f left join t_sod_data_logic a on (a.DATA_CLASS_ID = f.DATA_CLASS_ID AND f.type = 2 ) left join t_sod_database e on a.DATABASE_ID = e.id left join t_sod_database_define ee on e.database_define_id = ee.id left join t_sod_storage_configuration h on (a.DATA_CLASS_ID = h.DATA_CLASS_ID AND a.LOGIC_flag=h.LOGIC_ID AND e.id=h.DATABASE_ID) left join t_sod_logic_define c on a.logic_flag = c.logic_flag left join t_sod_data_table b on (a.id = b.CLASS_LOGIC_ID AND b.DB_TABLE_TYPE = 'E')
AND ee.database_name like '${map.database_name}%'
AND e.database_name like '${map.special_database_name}%'
AND f.class_name like '${map.class_name}%'
AND f.data_class_id like '${map.parent_id}%'
AND b.d_data_id like '${map.d_data_id}%'
AND c.logic_name like '${map.logic_name}%'
